name: Adobe DNG Camera Profile Recipe
summary: Learn about .DCPR files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: After saving a DCPR file in the DNG Profile Editor, you can export a DCP file by selecting File â†’ Export. This process is also referred to as "baking" the "recipe." The resulting DCP files can be used with digital photo editing applications such as Adobe Photoshop CS5 and Adobe Lightroom 2.

description: A DCPR file is a document created by DNG Profile Editor, a free Adobe application used to create .DCP digital camera profiles. It stores color tables, tone curve, and color matrices used to render RAW images. DCPR files are used for saving, loading, and editing the properties of a camera profile.
